Something triggered inside Artist and he remembered that he was already a
Maximal, so he walked into the Maximal base, and sure enough, he was already
on the friends list...
----- Original Message -----
From: <RgDaN@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 16, 2000 11:50 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Liono awakens goes on his intercom "All maximals return to base lets put
the
> newcomers through the streets." Ends his transmission. Looks at Zardus
> "Thanks for the help."  Liono suddenly drops to one knee "she is danger"
> Staggers to his feet " she can't leave not this soon. No, I will not
cannot
> lose her twice." Liono races of towards the maximal base charging his arm
> cannon letting the power build. Arriving at the ark seeing Hades shot
heading
> for Key's backside. Liono flies by grabbing Key and Spinning back so that
he
> gets shot in the back by Hades his back metal smoldering as smoke is
rising
> as Liono sets key down  "Hey Key we are a Team now and forever so don't
you
> dare get killed on me." Liono sets her down growls in pain lowly "and
> whispers I love you key" Liono turns to face Shuko "This is between you
and
> me lets see your the mighty Shuko I seen sewer Repair that look tougher
and
> smell better." Liono Fires A nice sized blue clear past Shuko.
>
> Tigerhawk looks at Anubis "you begotten spawn of a jackal its time some
put
> you back in your hole." Tigerhawk's twin shoulder pulse cannons lower and
> fire 4 Blast at Anubis.
